dish.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta with garlic in olive oil until crispy.
Beat the egg yolks and mix with grated cheese.
Drain pasta and reserve some water.
Toss pasta with pancetta and garlic.
Add egg mixture and toss quickly, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and salt.

dish.name: Chicken Curry
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder, cumin, coriander, and turmeric.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until softened.
Mix in yogurt and coconut milk, simmer until chicken is cooked.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice.

dish.name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar, sugar, and salt.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat.
Spread a thin layer of sushi rice on the nori.
Place cucumber, avocado, and crab sticks along the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice the roll into pieces and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

dish.name: Tacos
steps: Brown ground beef with onion and garlic.
Season with chili powder and cumin.
Warm the tortillas on a griddle.
Fill tortillas with seasoned beef and top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and hot sauce.

dish.name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough and place on a baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with fresh mozzarella and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

dish.name: Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
Toast croutons with olive oil and garlic.
In a bowl, toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with croutons, parmesan cheese, and a squeeze of lemon.

dish.name: Pav Bhaji
steps: Boil potatoes, peas, and cauliflower.
Cook onions and tomatoes in butter until soft.
Mash boiled vegetables and add to the pan with bhaji masala.
Simmer until the flavors combine.
Serve with buttered, toasted buns and garnish with cilantro and lemon.

dish.name: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Cook fettuccine pasta in salted water.
Season chicken breasts and cook in a pan until browned.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic.
Add heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Stir in parmesan cheese until the sauce thickens.
Toss cooked pasta and chicken in the sauce.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

dish.name: Pancakes
steps: Mix dry ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk eggs, milk, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Cook pancakes on a heated, greased griddle.
Serve with maple syrup.

dish.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Stir-fry garlic and ginger in sesame oil.
Add tofu and cook until lightly browned.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for a few more minutes.
Serve with steamed rice.

dish.name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Warm the corn tortillas.
Fill tortillas with seasoned beef and top with lettuce, cheese, sour cream, tomatoes, and salsa.

dish.name: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Slice eggplant and bread it with flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.
Fry eggplant slices in olive oil until golden.
Layer fried eggplant with tomato sauce and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Top with parmesan cheese and bake at 375°F for 25 minutes.
Garnish with fresh basil.

dish.name: Vegetable Samosas
steps: Boil potatoes and mash them.
Sauté onions, peas, and spices.
Mix the mashed potatoes with the cooked vegetables.
Wrap the mixture in phyllo dough and form triangles.
Fry the samosas until golden and crispy.
Serve with chutney and garnish with cilantro.

dish.name: Lasagna
steps: Cook lasagna noodles and set aside.
Cook ground beef with garlic, onions, and spices.
Mix ricotta cheese with herbs.
Layer lasagna noodles, meat sauce, ricotta cheese, and mozzarella.
Repeat layers and top with parmesan cheese.
Bake at 375°F for 40 minutes.

dish.name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted water.
Sauté shrimp, garlic, and red pepper flakes in butter and olive oil.
Add lemon juice and zest.
Toss cooked spaghetti with the shrimp and sauce.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

dish.name: Baked Ziti
steps: Cook ziti pasta and set aside.
Sauté garlic and onion, then add tomato sauce and spices.
Mix pasta with tomato sauce and ricotta cheese.
Top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese.
Bake at 350°F for 20-25 minutes.

dish.name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Sauté beef, onion, and garlic in butter.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft.
Stir in flour to thicken.
Add beef broth and simmer.
Finish with sour cream and serve over egg noodles.

dish.name: Chicken Parmesan
steps: Bread chicken with flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.
Fry chicken until golden.
Top with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

dish.name: Biriyani
steps: Wash and soak basmati rice for 30 minutes.
Cook chicken with spices, yogurt, and onions until tender.
Layer cooked rice and chicken in a pot.
Add saffron soaked in milk and ghee between layers.
Cover and cook on low heat until flavors combine.

dish.name: Nasi Goreng
steps: Cook rice and let it cool.
Sauté garlic, chili, and shallots in oil.
Add shrimp and stir-fry until cooked.
Push the mixture aside, scramble the egg, and mix with the shrimp.
Add rice and soy sauce, stir-frying until well combined.

dish.name: Satay
steps: Marinate chicken pieces with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Skewer the marinated chicken onto sticks.
Grill or barbecue until cooked through.
Serve with peanut sauce and a squeeze of lime.

dish.name: Kebab
steps: Mix ground lamb with onions, spices, and garlic.
Shape the mixture into skewers.
Grill or cook on a stovetop until browned and cooked through.
Serve with yogurt sauce or flatbread.

dish.name: Tempura
steps: Prepare shrimp and vegetables by cutting them into bite-sized pieces.
Make a batter by mixing flour, egg, and cold water.
Dip shrimp and vegetables into the batter.
Deep-fry in hot oil until golden and crispy.
Serve with a dipping sauce made of soy sauce and dashi.

dish.name: Paella
steps: Sauté chicken and onions in a large pan.
Add rice and saffron, stirring to coat.
Pour in broth and let it simmer.
Add seafood, peas, and bell peppers.
Cook until rice absorbs the liquid and seafood is done.

dish.name: Croissant
steps: Mix flour, yeast, sugar, and salt with milk to make dough.
Roll out the dough and layer with butter.
Fold and roll the dough multiple times to create layers.
Shape into crescent rolls and let them rise.
Bake until golden and flaky.

dish.name: Ratatouille
steps: Slice vegetables into even pieces.
Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
Layer vegetables in a baking dish, alternating colors.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake until tender.
Serve hot as a side or main dish.

dish.name: Moussaka
steps: Slice and roast eggplant until tender.
Cook minced meat with onions and tomato sauce.
Layer eggplant and meat mixture in a baking dish.
Top with bechamel sauce and cheese.
Bake until golden and bubbly.

dish.name: Pierogi
steps: Make dough by mixing flour, eggs, and water.
Prepare filling by mashing boiled potatoes with cheese.
Roll out dough and cut into circles.
Place filling in the center and fold into half-moons.
Boil until they float, then sauté with onions and butter.

dish.name: Fish and Chips
steps: Cut potatoes into thick slices and soak in water.
Coat fish fillets with a batter made of flour and beer.
Deep-fry potatoes until golden and crispy.
Fry the battered fish until cooked through and crispy.
Serve with salt and vinegar.

dish.name: Borscht
steps: Peel and grate beets, carrots, and onions.
Simmer vegetables in a pot with broth and potatoes.
Add chopped cabbage and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper, then stir in fresh dill.
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream.

dish.name: Haggis
steps: Boil the sheep's heart and liver until tender, then mince.
Mix with onions, oatmeal, suet, and spices.
Stuff the mixture into a cleaned sheep's stomach.
Boil for several hours until fully cooked.
Serve with mashed potatoes and turnips.

dish.name: Irish Stew
steps: Cut lamb, potatoes, onions, and carrots into chunks.
Layer the ingredients in a pot, starting with lamb.
Pour broth over the ingredients.
Simmer on low heat until meat is tender.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.

dish.name: Burger
steps: Shape ground beef into patties.
Grill or pan-fry patties until cooked to desired doneness.
Toast burger buns lightly on the grill or pan.
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and pickles.
Serve with ketchup, mustard, or other sauces.

dish.name: Hot Dog
steps: Grill or boil sausages until heated through.
Toast hot dog buns if desired.
Place the sausage in the bun.
Top with mustard, ketchup, and chopped onions.
Serve immediately.

dish.name: Apple Pie
steps: Peel and slice apples, then mix with sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice.
Prepare a pie crust and fill it with the apple mixture.
Cover with a top crust and seal edges.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) until the crust is golden brown.
Cool slightly before serving.

dish.name: Feijoada
steps: Soak black beans overnight, then drain.
Cook pork and beef with onions and garlic.
Add the beans and water, then simmer until tender.
Serve with rice, collard greens, and orange slices.

dish.name: Butter Tarts
steps: Prepare or buy tart shells.
Mix butter, sugar, eggs, and raisins to make the filling.
Fill tart shells with the mixture.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) until the filling is set and golden.

dish.name: Poutine
steps: Fry or bake french fries until crispy.
Layer fries with cheese curds.
Pour hot gravy over the top.
Serve immediately.

dish.name: Jollof Rice
steps: Blend tomatoes, onions, and peppers into a puree.
Cook chicken with spices, then remove and set aside.
Sauté the tomato puree in oil with spices.
Add rice and broth, then cook until tender.
Serve with the chicken and vegetables.

dish.name: Tiramisu
steps: Mix mascarpone cheese with sugar until smooth.
Dip ladyfingers briefly in coffee.
Layer dipped ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture in a dish.
Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder on top.
Chill for several hours before serving.
